Key Match Events: Ragnar Oratmangoen equalized for Indonesia in the 45th minute
Rafael Struick scored for Indonesia in the 75th minute
Mohamed Mahroon scored for Bahrain in the 98th minute
Post-Match Reflections: The Indonesian national team lodged a strong protest against the referee's decision
The hashtag #Wasit became a trending topic in Indonesia with over 212,000 tweets
Bahrain F.A. fined 10,000 Swiss francs for unsportsmanlike conduct by supporters
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match ended with a controversial extra time period
The referee allowed play to continue after the allotted 90+6 minutes had expired
